== Shiribagilu (CT) (627131) ==

Shiribagilu (CT) is a town in the [[Kasaragod]] taluka of [[Kasaragod]] district with an area of 5.5 sq. km. and harbouring 1449 households with total population of 7630 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kasaragod]] is at a distance of 5 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 660 km. Male population is 3757 and female population is 3873. Scheduled Caste population is 314 and Scheduled Tribes population is 89. Census Location Code of the town is 627131<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class V (population_total 5,000 to 9,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Mangalore(m corp. + og) at a distance of 58 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 192 km. Railway station is at Kasaragod at a distance of 5 km.
